parts.name: Mitsubishi Evo X Brembos on Lancer Ralliart / Outlander
parts.description: The Brembo brakes from an Evo X can be fitted to a Lancer Ralliart or V6 Outlander (GT). The front calipers bolt up, but rotors and dust shields differ.

parts.name: Nissan Akebono Big Brake Kit (370Z/G37)
parts.description: The massive 4-piston front / 2-piston rear Akebono calipers found on the 370Z Sport and G37 Sport are a direct bolt-on for many Nissan/Infiniti vehicles, including 350Z, G35, M35/M45, and FX35/45. Requires adapter brackets for some older models (350Z/G35).
specs: Requires 18" or 19" wheels depending on spoke design

parts.name: Subaru Legacy GT (LGT) Brake Upgrade
parts.description: The front brakes from a 2005-2009 Legacy GT are significantly larger (316mm) than standard WRX or Impreza brakes. They are a direct bolt-on upgrade for almost any Subaru from 1993-2014 (excluding STi 5x114 hubs).

parts.name: Subaru 6-Speed STI Transmission Swap
parts.description: The STI 6-speed manual transmission is legendary for its strength. It can be swapped into WRXs, Foresters, and Legacys. Requires matching rear differential ratio (usually R180) and axles.
specs: DCCD (Driver Controlled Center Diff) requires controller for full functionality
Requires STI driveshaft, axles, hubs (or hybrid axles)

parts.name: Nissan VQ35HR / VQ37VHR Intake Manifold on DE
parts.description: While not a direct bolt-on, the lower intake manifold from the HR (High Rev) engines can be adapted to the older DE engines for better flow. The upper plenum from a 'RevUp' DE is a direct bolt-on for non-RevUp DEs.
specs: RevUp Plenum (2005-2006) -> Non-RevUp (2003-2004): Direct swap, gains top end

parts.name: Honda CR-V AWD Drivetrain into Civic/Integra
parts.description: The AWD system from a 1st or 2nd Gen CR-V (B-Series or K-Series) can be transplanted into a Civic or Integra. This is a major fabrication project requiring a custom fuel cell, rear subframe modification, and driveshaft shortening.
specs: B-Series AWD: CR-V (1997-2001) transmission + rear diff
K-Series AWD: CR-V (2002-2006) or Element transmission + rear diff
High difficulty: 'AWD Civic' builds are popular for drag racing

parts.name: Mazda RX-7 (FD) Brakes on RX-8 / NC Miata
parts.description: Interestingly, while the RX-8 is newer, the FD RX-7 4-piston front calipers are lighter and offer excellent clamping force. They can be adapted to other Mazdas, though RX-8 brakes are generally considered sufficient.

parts.name: Toyota Aristo 2JZ-GTE Swap into GS300 / IS300
parts.description: The JDM Toyota Aristo (V300) is the twin of the Lexus GS300 but came with the twin-turbo 2JZ-GTE. This is the most direct engine swap for a GS300 (JZS160) or IS300 (XE10), as mounts and oil pans largely match.
specs: Transmission: Aristo 4-speed auto is weak point, swap to R154 or CD009 manual

parts.name: Nissan S13 / S14 / S15 Suspension Interchange
parts.description: Suspension arms are largely interchangeable between S13 (240SX), S14, and S15 Silvias, with some exceptions. S14/S15 rear subframes are wider and have better geometry (anti-squat) than S13.
specs: S14/S15 Rear Subframe -> S13: Popular upgrade (requires offset bushings)
Front Lower Control Arms: S14 are longer (more camber/track width) than S13

parts.name: Mitsubishi 3000GT VR4 Brakes on DSM
parts.description: The 4-piston front calipers from a 3000GT VR4 (or Stealth TT) bolt onto 1st and 2nd Gen Eclipse/Talon/Laser (DSM) with minor modifications (rotors need redrilling or specific brackets).
specs: Cheap big brake kit for DSMs
